channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Gunman who killed 4 at NYC building was targeting NFL offices, but took wrong elevator, mayor says
item.description: New York City Mayor Eric Adams says that a gunman who killed four people at a Manhattan office building was trying to target the headquarters of the National Football League but took the wrong elevator.

item.title: Victims of New York City shooting include a police officer and an executive at investment firm
What to know about the shooting at a New York City office tower that killed 4
